name: Snackstronaut Demo
description:
Want to help the development of the project? Become a game tester!

Grow carrots on an unusual planet!

Story

Scientific advances in astronomy and space travel have affected agriculture! It has been found that on certain planets in the far reaches of the galaxy, gathering food and resources is much easier than on Earth.  On this planet, Caro, crops grow much faster than usual. You are a snackstronaut, a specialist who understands both space travel and agriculture. Gather carrots and other resources on this new planet.

How to Play

Harvest crops, fish, and take flight to gather resources.

Walk around in the fenced area to plant crops. Weed and water them as necessary. 

Carrots: Use these to fuel the rocket or buy items at the store. Grow them in the fenced area or occasionally find them by fishing.
Moon beans: Use these to move faster. Find them by fishing. Moonstones: Use these to buy items at the store. Find them by traveling in the rocket or fishing.

Dubloon: Use these to buy items at the store. Find them by fishing.

Controls

Move: WASD or arrow keys

Action: Left Mouse Button or Enter

Weed Plants: J

Water Plants: K

Run: Left Shift

Pause: Escape or Right Shift

Camera: G
